attributes.action: Disallow the iPhone Locking System in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the UK, we have one of the largest choice of mobile devices in the world.  When people buy a mobile device, they should be able to expect to use it in a way that suits them, and not adhere to certain rules. The iPhone should still be available to buy on o2, but then, for a higher price (£50-£100 more, say), there should be an unlocked version available to the public.
